entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable Publish a MacCatalyst app from Windows #25805
  • Full list of bugs and issues with new .NET 9 HybridWebView #25804
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Image and Font Failed to load on iPhone 15 plus which results to a white empty page #25796
  • Entry is autofocused in a Popup but the soft keyboard is not opened, also cannot be opened from code! #25793
  • Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #25792
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] D15_Step4 Pressing the Enter (arrow) key on the virtual keyboard does not complete the message and the label does not turn light blue. #25787
    Backlog
  • No way to catch permissions requests from new .NET 9 HybridWebView? Old method doesn't work anymore. #25784
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • FontImageSource Glyph becomes invisible intermittently on Android #25783
    Backlog
  • New HybridWebView .NET 9 functions to invoke Javascript - documentation, uncaught exceptions, forcing all Javascript to return JSON? #25782
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Fluent System design kit for MAUI #25645
  • [Discussion] Unfocus Android controls behavior vs accessibility #25688
  • [MAUI] Can't clear RadioButton Selection #25780
    Backlog
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly touch .net maui hybrid app #25790
  • Touchscreen Functionality Crashing on Rapid Touch in .NET Maui Hybrid App #25791
    Backlog
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] After upgrading to 9.0 RC2, the game crashes at start both in Debug and Release configuration #25150
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Windows Build Errors #25132
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hyper-V #25788
  • How to get the element's position of its parent element on iOS or Mac? #25797
  • Collection View Scrolling Not Smooth on iOS 18 (Version 8.0.92), While Versions 8.0.40 and iOS 17 Perform Smoothly #25369
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] After Navigating back the screen shows half of previous and half of the page before the previous page #25571
  • Error with Application.Current.Quit #25672
  • MeasureInvalided of the Parent is not being invoked when a Child invalidates itself #14706
    Backlog
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • drawing text is not same as in winform with same font and font size? #25703

PullRequests

Created

  • Download using new APIs #25800
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 6 #25785
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Stable Branding for SR1 #25786

Updated

  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area-essentials, area-controls-map
  • Fixed the hide password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #25768
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
